recipesJson.name: Sátyra
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description:
Because everyone loves Strawberries and Cream. Max concentrates = max flavor! 100% mixing %

Tastes just like Nesquick!

reviews.text: I don't  rate recipes much, but when I do,  they taste like muted dishwater soap,  and  this one hit the spot, pure puckness....

As co owners of the Two Buck Cattle Ranch and B&B, my partner and I have been concerned about the damaging effects of cow farts on the environment.  After adding this to our cattle feed I can report 100% success, and are pleased to announce a change to the ranches name to reflect this; We are now The Two Buck Fat Unicorn Petting Playground and B&B.   Mention you read it here and you're entitled to a free rainbow soft-serve and an hour petting session!
How has nobody thought of this??
Use it to refill my Glade pods. Works great as an air freshener
I didn't even use percentages. I just dumped my full bottles of flavor into an empty 2 liter of Mountain Dew and added a bit of VG. I may never see again, but it tasted grate. A+
I think all of the Maltol in Strawberry Ripe made this absolutely flavorless.  Nice body though ;)
I subbed strawberry/ strawberry ripe for 90% alpine strawberry and then subbed the rest of the shit for 10% fucking brie cheese. Spot on now.

Pros: Cured my ED. Removes grease stains off driveway
Cons: causes blindness
I am now gay. Thank you for this amazing recipe. ASL on any demon boys ;)
I can't decide whether this tastes like cancer or diabetes...
It could use some tfa cheesecake

I would give it 5 stars but it's a little light on flavour.
Looks, sounds, smells & jiggles just like nesquik. Spot-on, except for the actual taste. 2 thumbs up!
Dripped straight into tank. 14 drops BC, 17 drops CGC, 14 drops Strawberry, 20 drops ripe, etc. Can't put it down, can't pick it up either ! lmao
Tastes just like strawberry nesquick, bringing me back to that nostalgic moment of my childhood, when I sat by the tv watching cartoon network.
If you dont make a gallon of this right now turn in your mixer card. Recognize beauty when you see it this is a work of art.
This is heaven. I mixed a liter and I can't put it down.
